Package com.github.pidygb.gestureutilities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScrollToHideRecyclerViewListener.OnScrollToHideCallback
    The callback interface used by ScrollToHideRecyclerViewListener to inform its client to hide or not something because the RecyclerView page scrolls.
    SwipeDismissViewListener.OnSwipeDismissListener
    The callback interface used by SwipeDismissViewListener to inform its client about a successful dismissal of one or more list item positions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScrollToHideRecyclerViewListener
    A View.OnTouchListener and a RecyclerView.OnScrollListener that callbacks when hide or show something syncronized the RecyclerView scrolling.
    SwipeDismissViewListener
    A View.OnTouchListener and a RecyclerView.OnScrollListener that makes the list items in a RecyclerView dismissable.
